metadata.description: Welcome to Alabaster Shadows, where all the houses look the same, but something’s definitely… different. Carter and his sister Polly are new to the neighborhood, and they can tell right away that the head of the Community Council, Miss Crowe, doesn’t like children at all. But with some kind encouragement from the mysterious Mr. Randolph, the Normandy kids explore their new home, keeping a lookout for anything strange or out-of-the-ordinary—like, say, an otherworldly water leak in the basement.
metadata.name: Alabaster Shadows
